resources.string: The list of ROMs has been refreshed.
The log file was not found
An error has occurred while sharing
Logs will be displayed in a compact form factor
The logs will be displayed in a verbose form factor
The system will emulate being in handheld mode
The system will emulate being in docked mode
The size of the buffer used to store audio samples for ROMs using audren. A lower value will result in less latency but potentially increased audio stutter depending on the performance of the device
We use libfmt for formatting strings (Custom License)
We use oboe for audio output during emulation (Apache License 2.0)
We use Vulkan-Hpp for using Vulkan with a C++ API (Apache License 2.0)
We use TinyXML2 for parsing the preference XML to retrieve settings from C++ (zLib License)
We use java-string-similarity to power our search functionality (Apache License 2.0)
We use AndroidX to have a consistent user-experience across Android versions (Apache License 2.0)
We use Android Material Components to have a consistent material design UI (Apache License 2.0)
We use Kotlin Standard Library for accessing convenience functions in Kotlin (Apache License 2.0)
The license of Skyline (LGPLv3 or later)
